More Leandro Bolmaro NBA Stats »

NBA Transactions

Nov 18, 2020 - The New York Knicks selected Leandro Bolmaro in Round 1 with Pick 23 in the 2020 NBA Draft. Nov 20, 2020 - The draft rights to Leandro Bolmaro was acquired by the Minnesota Timberwolves, along with Ricky Rubio and the draft rights to Jaden McDaniels, from the New York Knicks in exchange for James Johnson, the draft rights to Mathias Lessort, the draft rights to Aleksej Pokusevski, a 2023 2nd round pick (DET own) and a 2024 2nd round pick (MIN own). Sep 17, 2021 - Leandro Bolmaro signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves. Oct 28, 2021 - The Minnesota Timberwolves assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Oct 30, 2021 - The Minnesota Timberwolves recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Nov 6, 2021 - The Minnesota Timberwolves assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Nov 9, 2021 - The Minnesota Timberwolves recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Nov 15, 2021 - The Minnesota Timberwolves assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Nov 18, 2021 - The Minnesota Timberwolves recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Jan 16, 2022 - The Minnesota Timberwolves assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Jan 30, 2022 - The Minnesota Timberwolves recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Feb 14, 2022 - The Minnesota Timberwolves assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Mar 4, 2022 - The Minnesota Timberwolves recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Apr 1, 2022 - The Minnesota Timberwolves assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Apr 2, 2022 - The Minnesota Timberwolves recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Iowa Wolves of the G League. Jul 6, 2022 - Leandro Bolmaro was acquired by the Utah Jazz, along with Malik Beasley, Patrick Beverley, Jarred Vanderbilt, the draft rights to Walker Kessler, a 2023 1st round pick (MIN own), a 2025 1st round pick (MIN own), a Swap 2026 1st round picks, a 2027 1st round pick (MIN own), a conditional 2029 1st round pick (MIN own) and a TPE, from the Minnesota Timberwolves in exchange for Rudy Gobert and a TPE. Nov 8, 2022 - The Utah Jazz assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Nov 14, 2022 - The Utah Jazz recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Nov 16, 2022 - The Utah Jazz assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Nov 21, 2022 - The Utah Jazz recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Dec 3, 2022 - The Utah Jazz assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Dec 5, 2022 - The Utah Jazz recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Dec 7, 2022 - The Utah Jazz assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Dec 8, 2022 - The Utah Jazz recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Dec 14, 2022 - The Utah Jazz assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Dec 15, 2022 - The Utah Jazz recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Jan 4, 2023 - The Utah Jazz assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Jan 8, 2023 - The Utah Jazz recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Jan 19, 2023 - The Utah Jazz assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Jan 20, 2023 - The Utah Jazz recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Jan 21, 2023 - The Utah Jazz assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Jan 22, 2023 - The Utah Jazz recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Jan 30, 2023 - The Utah Jazz assigned Leandro Bolmaro to the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Jan 31, 2023 - The Utah Jazz recalled Leandro Bolmaro from the Salt Lake City Stars of the G League. Feb 16, 2023 - The Utah Jazz placed the contract of Leandro Bolmaro on waivers. Feb 18, 2023 - Leandro Bolmaro, previously with the Utah Jazz, became a free agent.

Frequently Asked Questions

Leandro Bolmaro is 6-6 (198cm) tall.

Leandro Bolmaro is 200 lbs (91kg).

Leandro Bolmaro was born on Sep 11, 2000.

Leandro Bolmaro plays the PF position.

Leandro Bolmaro has a Argentina nationality.

Leandro Bolmaro was born in Cordoba, Argentina.

Leandro Bolmaro last wore the #10 jersey number.

Leandro Bolmaro current players for the AX Armani Exchange Milan.

Who is Leandro Bolmaro's agent?

Leandro Bolmaro's agent is Igor Crespo.

How many NBA seasons has Leandro Bolmaro played?

Leandro Bolmaro played 2 seasons in the NBA.

What are the career averages of Leandro Bolmaro?

Leandro Bolmaro had career averages 1.1 points, 1.0 rebounds in 49 games.

What are the career totals of Leandro Bolmaro?

Leandro Bolmaro had career totals of 56 points, 50 rebounds, 28 assists, 1 blocks, 9 steals in 49 games.

How many teams has Leandro Bolmaro been on?

Leandro Bolmaro played for 2 NBA teams in his career - Minnesota Timberwolves, Utah Jazz.

When was Leandro Bolmaro drafted?

Leandro Bolmaro was drafted in the 1st round (#23 overall) of the 2020 NBA Draft by the New York Knicks.

What is Leandro Bolmaro's career high in points?

Leandro Bolmaro averaged a career high 1.4 points per game in 2021-2022.

What is Leandro Bolmaro's career high in rebounds?

Leandro Bolmaro averaged a career high 1.2 rebounds per game in 2021-2022.

What is Leandro Bolmaro's career high in assists?

Leandro Bolmaro averaged a career high 0.6 assists per game in 2021-2022.

What is the career PER of Leandro Bolmaro's?
